ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors thank Professor Iraj Jafari Anarkooli (Zanjan University of Medical Sciences), Professor H. Moghimi (Department of Microbiology, Tehran University), and Professor M. Musavi (Agriculture and Natural Resources Research Center, Zanjan) for their constructive feedback and comments. This study was supported by a grant from Shahrekord University of Medical Sciences (Grant no. IR.SKUMS.REC.1394.145) and two supplementary grants from the Biotechnology Development Council (Grant no. 950612) and Zanjan University of Medical Sciences (ZUMS-543).
